articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Bearman: Ferrari F1 boss Vasseur told me "don't be a hero" - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Oliver Bearman says that Ferrari Formula 1 boss Fred Vasseur told him “don’t try to be a hero” when he jumped into Carlos Sainz’s car in Jeddah on Friday.
articles.content:
Bearman was called in after Sainz was ruled out of the rest of the Jeddah event due to appendicitis, with the Spaniard requiring surgery.
The 18-year-old had to abandon his Prema F2 seat, having sec… [+4158 chars]
